name: Balls Roaming
description:
The theme of the jam was MAGTNETIC, so basically, there are balls roaming around and get drawn to you as you get close to them. Avoid them for as long as you can with "WASD".

The trick is navigating the ball. It doesn't easily change directions.

This was my first attempt in using LootLocker for saving user data. I will work on this in the future to make it better. Cheers
